nodes.text: Gold Squadron Lager was a gold-colored alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The lager was suitable for human consumption, and it was considered a lighter option than Gamorrean Ale.

Gold Squadron Lager is a lager that has been available at the out-of-universe Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge since the opening of the theme park in 2019. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. It is named after the Rebel Alliance's Gold Squadron, which first appeared in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
Gold Squadron Lager is brewed by Blue Point Brewing Company from Patchogue, New York. It is 5.0% alcohol by volume, and the menu describes it as, "golden lager with lavender and plum flavors."
